text:
hi guys, anyone have experience of sorting the results with multiple columns?
hubdb_table_rows(143, 'orderBy=featured,-created_at')

I want to sort the result to always make the featured at the top then sort the other none featured item by date
have you tried adding orderBy twice?
I tried it just a while ago before asking it didn't work, not I tried again and it worked, I might had a typo or HubSpot cache
